english.segment1: New day springs light on the burdened, the downcast. My past lingers to define the outcast. I long for the coming of chapter two. To put an end to this cycle of backlash. So I start where the last chapter ended. But the veil has been lifted, my thoughts are sifted. Every wrong is righted. The new song I sing with every breath, breathes sight in
english.segment2: So let your face consume my mind, right
english.segment3: Hair standing on end, it's sent forth. Is this the end I was always meant for?. I still long for the taste of better days long ago. Long past, so dead to me but yet. Here it is in the palm of my hand to see. As I witness the birth of a new beginning. I sense it breathing, I feel it seething. I see my fear begin fading
english.segment4: Breath on me for my new beginning
